analysis.description:
ERC20 (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#62-67) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#63)

ASTRICOSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#152-165) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(ownerAddress,msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#163-164)

ASTRICOSale.STAGE_FOUR_TIME_END should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#114-117)
ASTRICOSale.STAGE_ONE_TIME_END should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#110-111)
ASTRICOSale.STAGE_THREE_TIME_END should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#112-114)
ASTRICOSale.STAGE_TWO_TIME_END should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#111-112)
ASTRICOSale.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#86-87)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_coinsPerEther' of ASTRICOSale.setNewRate (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#196) is not in mixedCase

ASTRICOSale.decimals (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#86-87) is never used in ASTRICOSale
ASTRICOSale.BASIC_RATE (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#94-95) is never used in ASTRICOSale
ASTRICOSale.PRICE_STAGE_PS (/unique_chucks/11/0xac91f7764a3eee9476d2f1c622df7c8e7afe1325.sol#96-97) is never used in ASTRICOSale
